title: "How can self-hypnosis and focused action lead to achieving one's true purpose in trading?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens, the text describes a method of achieving success by a young trader who learnt to hypnotize himself. He realized that having money alone was not enough and focused on achieving his goals using his knowledge and experience. The text introduces the "Method of Magnetic Success" which is based on four successive phases: achieving control over self and vital force, eliminating useless activities, developing personal magnetism, and setting clear objectives. This method is aimed at helping individuals accomplish their desires and move towards their true purpose in life.
content: After he had read plentiful books, he felt that theory alone was not enough for him, and that, in order to gain access to a higher level of learning, it was incumbent on him to practice it out. He thus learnt to hypnotize himself. As soon he mastered the application of self-hypnosis to his subjective purposes, results began to materialize ever more frequently. The most important thing for that youth is that he now realizes that his life consists in moving towards what he truly wants to accomplish. Purpose and Summary of our Method of Magnetic Success Our method is founded on four successive phases: 1. Achieving control over our own selves as well as our vital force. Eliminating those useless and dispersive activities which originate, not in our clear choice, but rather in the ghosts of our subconscious, in vacuous desires, and in the predilection for basking in convenient situations. Doing this will simultaneously occasion the development of an increasingly greater personal magnetism. 2.
last_phrase: In conclusion, by mastering the art of self-hypnosis and aligning his actions with his specific goals, the youth in this story has learned the importance of eliminating distractions and taking control of his own life. Our method of magnetic success, founded on the principles of self-control and a clear sense of purpose, can help anyone achieve their objectives and live a more fulfilling life. By following the four phases of our method, you too can harness your personal magnetism and achieve the success you desire.
